markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Unfetter Eidolon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1051)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** your  eidolon 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.
name: Unfetter Eidolon

<summary>
You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.

summary: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.
summary_markdown: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.
text: Unfetter Eidolon Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 145 2.0 Cast somatic, verbal Range 100 feet Target your eidolon Duration 1 minute --- You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.
